page.title: 06A Working Mum's Day in Stev.
page.content: My day starts at 6.3Oa.m.I sit down for breakfast with the family at 7.3O and leave at 8.3Oam to drive the mile to the{school}where I teach.The morning session from 9-12 is broken by a fifteen minute{coffee break, which I have in the staffroom. There is an hour and a quarter lunch break before the afternoon session begins. School finishes at 3.15 and I leave for home an hour later, having organized the{classroom}in readiness for the next day. On arriving home I provide a snack for my children before preparing the evening meal, which we eat around 6.OO. The rest of the evening is spent in planning school work for the following day, doing housework, watching{T.V.}and preparing a light {supper.}
